translations: adv.形象地，生动地；以图表形式

phrs.translation: 用图表表示, 用图表表现
以图形方式工作, 工作生动地, 工作图形化

sentences.sentence: As is graphically depicted in the cartoon, modern life has been dominated by computers.
sentences.translation: 正如漫画中形象描述的那样，现代生活已经被电脑主宰。

sentences.sentence: I also mention in my book that when we use the OO paradigm, it is not easy to represent graphically at all times where our application is.
sentences.translation: 在书中我还提到，当我们使用 OO 范式的时候，要在任何时间图形化地表示出我们的应用程序在哪里并不容易。

sentences.sentence: This data is shown graphically on the opposite page.
sentences.translation: 对页以图表显示这些数据。
